text: haey puokke nung suor anak( mou ham meat) ampi chheamordauv . chaur anak chhlaey tha chheamordauv noh ku vea kakhvak bamphot . hetonih chaur puok anak chiesaveang( ruomrk) pi phriyea knongamlongpel del mean rdauv haey kom tow chit puok neang( daembi ruomrk) rhaut tealte puok neang chreah saat ( asa rdauv haey ngouttuk saamat) khluonobran sen . baekalna puok neang chreah saat haey noh puok anak ach ruom r k cheamuoy puok neang now trangkanleng( bradeab phet) del a l laoh ban anounhnhat aoy puok anak . pitabrakd nasa a l laoh sraleanh banda anak del sarphap tosakamhosa ning sraleanh banda anak del chreah saat
